scripts.build: rm -rf dist/ && esbuild index.ts --bundle --outfile=dist/index.js --platform=node --target=node16.8 --format=esm --banner:js="import { createRequire as topLevelCreateRequire } from 'module'; const require = topLevelCreateRequire(import.meta.url); import { dirname } from 'node:path'; import { fileURLToPath } from 'node:url'; const __filename = fileURLToPath(import.meta.url); const __dirname = dirname(__filename); " && cp -R index.d.ts dist/index.d.ts
